typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		file as string,
		message as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> MailSource
MailSource derive(IsvaildRow = isNull(message)) ~> DerivedColumns
DerivedColumns split(isNull(message)!= true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> FilterOnlyVaildRecord@(OnlyVaildRecord, InvaildRecord)
